original_text: And they laughed him to scorn. But when he had put them all out, he taketh the father and the mother of the damsel, and them that were with him, and entereth in where the damsel was lying.
korean_text: 그들이 비웃더라 예수께서 그들을 다 내보내신 후에 아이의 부모와 또 자기와 함께 한 자들을 데리시고 아이 있는 곳에 들어가사

sentences.original_text: And they laughed him to scorn.
But when he had put them all out,
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그가 그들을 모두 내보낸 후,

sentences.original_text: he taketh the father and the mother of the damsel,
and them that were with him,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그와 함께 있던 사람들을 데리고,

sentences.original_text: and entereth in where the damsel was lying.
